pageProps.description: The operation provides an ability to resize input image.  GammaCV supports a few different ways to reduce the dimension of an image, for example,  we support "Nearest Neighbor Scaling" and an approach known as "Bicubic Scaling".  Source of the algorithms source https://www.researchgate.net/publication/272092207_A_Novel_Visual_Cryptographic_Method_for_Color_Images
